code: var initialPostsState=[];var postsReducer=function postsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialPostsState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'SET_POSTS':{return[].concat(action.payload);}default:{return[].concat(state);}}};export default postsReducer;
